docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

Note

this website is created to be a simple way to use mkdocs.

go to installing your ide to continue.

docs.title: installing your IDE
docs.text:
1.go to: https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads/

2.download and install the community edition.

3.in visual studio install asp.net and web dev package

to continue go to tools

docs.title: tools
docs.text:
1. go to the link below to download lastest version of python https://www.python.org/downloads/ 2.after installing python open terminal and use this command to install Material for MkDocs
pip install mkdocs-material

docs.title: follow these steps
docs.text:
1. make a folder where you want to have mkdoc material be at.

2.open it with visual studio.

3.open the command prompt in vs and run this code:

mkdocs new .

This will create the following structure:

 -docs/index.md
 -mkdocs.yml

to publish the page go to https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/publishing-your-site/
